payload.description: Create frontend/src/services/courseService.js. Export functions: getCourses(), getCourseById(id), createCourse(data), updateCourse(id, data), publishCourse(id), addQuestToCourse(courseId, questId, data), removeQuestFromCourse(courseId, questId), reorderQuests(courseId, questIds), enrollInCourse(courseId), getCourseProgress(courseId). Use api client from authService.js.
payload.context: Reference frontend/src/services/questService.js and badgeService.js for patterns. Use existing api instance with httpOnly cookies. All POST requests need empty body {} for CSRF.
